CustomField.formula:
CASE( TEXT( Status__c ) ,
'New Position', IMAGE("/resource/Green", "Green",50,50) , 'Pending Approval', IMAGE("/resource/seafoam_green", "Seafoam Green",50,50) , 'Open-Approved', IMAGE("/resource/Yellow", "Yellow",50,50) , 'Closed - Failed', IMAGE("/resource/Pink", "Pink",50,50) , 'Closed - Not Approved', IMAGE("/resource/Blue", "Blue",50,50) , 'Closed - Cancel', IMAGE("/resource/Red", "Red",50,50) ,
"Sorry ! No Image Found")
CustomField.label: Position Status Image
